entry.title: Fresh Plus - Watermelon Drink Crystals - 450g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: FOOD
Price: 3.99 - 38.99 (2 variants)

Fresh Plus - Watermelon Drink Mix Crystals - 450g

Beat the heat with a cool slushy or granita made from this Drink Crystals!

Guests will start craving your colorful slushies as soon as they see them at your carnival cart or concession stand. Keep up with the demand for these refreshing treats with this  slushy Crystals! With the large amount of servings per container, your venue will be in good supply. Simply pair it with a compatible pump for fast, efficient service.

Use Ideas

Great as a drink crystal and is also ideal as a slush.

Awesome Flavor

Great flavors at a great value, and this flavor enhances the appearance, color, and taste of your icy cold drinks. The colors and flavors are sure to boost impulse sales.

Great for Slushies, Snow Cones

Just a small amount of these Crystals will help you make a large number of profitable drinks! You can even begin offering light and sweet granitas to put a new spin on your coffee shop or cafe's drink menu.

PRODUCT INFORMATION

Lynch Fresh Plus Drink Crystals are packed with authentic fruit taste.

USE IDEAS

Great as a drink crystal and is also ideal as a slush.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

DRINK: Add contents of package (450 g) to 4.5 L (160 fl oz) of cold water. Mix until dissolved. Chill. Stir before serving. SLUSH: Mix 2 pouches (900 g) of flavour crystals with 4 L (140 fl oz) cold water and put into machine. Rinse container using 2L (70 fl oz) of cold water and pour into machine. A total of 6L (210 fl oz) cold water is used. Products take approximately 1 hour to become a slushie.

INGREDIENTS

Sugar, citric and/or malic acid and/or sodium citrate, natural and/or artificial flavour, ascorbic acid (vitamin c - 270mg/100g), colour, tricalcium phosphate and/or silicon dioxide, may contain cellulose and/or arabic gum.

entry.title: Fresh Plus - Iced Tea Mix - 450g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: FOOD
Price: 3.99 - 38.99 (2 variants)

Fresh Plus - Iced Tea Drink Mix Crystals - 450g

PRODUCT INFORMATION

A cool and refreshing beverage, perfect for quenching your thirst. Made with high quality instant tea, this is a favourite with kids and adults alike!

USE IDEAS

Can be used for both alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks; add lemon or lime.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

DRINK: Add contents of package (450 g) to 4.5 L (160 fl oz) of cold water. Mix until dissolved. Chill. Stir before serving. SLUSH: Mix 2 pouches (900 g) of flavour crystals with 4 L (140 fl oz) cold water and put into machine. Rinse container using 2L (70 fl oz) of cold water and pour into machine. A total of 6L (210 fl oz) cold water is used. Products take approximately 1 hour to become a slushie.

INGREDIENTS

Sugar, citric acid, instant tea, artificial & natural flavour, tricalcium phosphate, caramel, colour.

entry.title: Lynch Bar Choice - Lime Bar Mix Crystals - 800g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: FOOD
Price: 7.99

Lynch Bar Choice - Lime Bar Mix Crystals - 800g

PRODUCT INFORMATION

A strong sour lime flavour ideal for both alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.

USE IDEAS

Great for a variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

Fill a 4L container halfway with water, add contents of package and stir until dissolved. Add water to fill the remainder of the container.

INGREDIENTS

Sugar, citric acid, natural flavour, tricalcium phosphate, quillaia extract, colour, gum Arabic.
